title: Poster clips
content:
Hi All!

Does anyone know how you call these "poster clips"?  
 [http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/6262/lundk.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115150/http:/img17.imageshack.us/img17/6262/lundk.jpg "http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/6262/lundk.jpg")

and does anyone know where I can buy them?

I've tried to google poster clips but I don't get any relevant results or any store that sells them

Thanks for all your help!

author: swisscheese

comments.content: It's hard to see but is it a fancy A-Clamp system?
It looks like galvanized pipe + plastic alligator clamps from the home depot.
